Zardus told him about the cloaking devices in the weapon storage, and he 
made his way to it. "haaaa, here it is!" he found what he looked for in, 
basically, the last box that was in the weapon storage.  It wasn't hard to 
install it in his system. A few jerry riges and it was ready.  He looked for 
a reflection surface of any kind. he soon found one a tested out his new 
toy. *SLICH!* went the device, and he was gone in the mirror. He turned it 
off and put another cloaking device in a easy to see place in the storage 
place, then headed back to the bridge.  "I'm ready!"
